Package org.educraft.block.ordering

Provides the classes necessary to create and use the ordering bench.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockOrderingBench
    An ordering bench is a type of crafting bench that takes three numbers as input, and will return a DoorKey if and only if the numbers are arranged in order from smallest to largest
    OrderingContainer
    Container used to represent the inventory of an ordering bench.
    OrderingGui  
    OrderingTileEntity  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BenchType
    Enum type describing the different kinds of ordering bench.
    OrderingCraftingManager
    The crafting manager is used by the container to determine which patterns of
